settlement-roads.midnightconfig.initialL: Number of structures to locate on world load
Select the number of structures to locate on world load. Higher number = longer loading time
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.maxLocat: Maximum number of structures to locate
Select the maximum number of structures to locate dynamically. Higher number = more memory usage
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.structur: Select or type the structure you want to locate. E.g., #minecraft:village, minecraft:village_plains or modid:custom_structure. Allows structure tags and keys.
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.averagin: Amount of terrain averaging done for artificial roads
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.allowArt: Whether artificial roads are allowed to generate
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.allowNat: Whether natural roads are allowed to generate
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.placeWay: Disables road generation in favor of waypoint generation
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.maxHeigh: Maximum height difference allowed for roads. Higher values allow steeper roads. Default: 5
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.maxTerra: Terrain stability threshold. Higher values allow rougher terrain. Default: 4
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.maxConcu: Maximum number of roads that can be generated simultaneously. Lower values reduce performance impact but slow down road generation. Default: 3
settlement-roads.midnightconfig.title: Countered's Settlement Roads
gui.settlementroads.debug_map.title: Settlement Roads - Debug Map
